She also describes the role of the information specialist in the programme.</articleSummary>     <issueNumber><a href="/issue69">issue69</a></issueNumber>     <publishedDate>July 2012</publishedDate>     <articleType><a href="/category/article-type/feature-article">feature article</a></articleType>     <authors><a href="/taxonomy/term/1143/author-info">tertia coetsee</a></authors>   </node>   <node>     <title><a href="/issue69/fitzgibbon-lau">Evaluation of Assessment Diaries and GradeMark at the University of Glamorgan</a></title>     <articleSummary>Karen Fitzgibbon and Alice Lau describe a JISC-funded project in evaluating the pedagogical and workload impact that two assessment- and feedback-related innovations have on students and staff and report on lessons for the sector.</articleSummary>     <issueNumber><a href="/issue69">issue69</a></issueNumber>     <publishedDate>July 2012</publishedDate>     <articleType><a
